amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funding for any diversity, equity, and inclusion program or office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 202 (Roll no. 388).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 202 (Roll no. 388).
